title: Epitaph for Kekilianos
support: Three joining fragments of marble plaque: the two fragments on the right were set in plaster in modern times.

handNote.lettering: Quadrate Ε, square lunate Σ, cursive Ω. Two Christograms with the letters A and Σ at start and end of inscription and a dove holding a twig below.

date._: 4th century CE or first half of 5th century CE

provenanceFound._: Found in 1740 “in via qua ad suburbium itur' (Amico)

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
